game.objective: Defeat the fearsome dragon that has been terrorizing the kingdom.
game.reward: 1000 gold coins and a legendary sword

tasks.description: Gather information about the dragon's lair
tasks.objective: Talk to the villagers and gather intel on the dragon's whereabouts.
Retrieve the legendary sword hidden within the depths of the dungeon.
Follow the clues and reach the entrance of the dragon's lair.
Engage in an epic battle and slay the fearsome dragon.

game.title: Dragon Slayer
